info.title: HMPPS Manage Adjudications API
info.description: API for managing adjudications for prisoners

parameters.name: awardCutoffDate
parameters.description: Only awards ending on or after this date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) will be considered.

parameters.name: adjudicationCutoffDate
parameters.description: Only proved adjudications ending on or after this date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) will be counted.

get.summary: Get all reported adjudications for caseload

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: optional inclusive start date for results, default is today - 3 days

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: optional inclusive end date for results, default is today

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: list of status filter for reports

parameters.name: transfersOnly
parameters.description: optional filter for transferred reports only

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N). Default 0, e.g. the first page

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default 20

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort as combined comma separated property and uppercase direction. Multiple sort params allowed to sort by multiple properties. Default to dateTimeOfDiscovery DESC

get.summary: Returns all the in progress draft adjudications created by the current user

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: optional inclusive start date for results, default is today - 3 days

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: optional inclusive end date for results, default is today

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N). Default 0, e.g. the first page

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default 20

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort as combined comma separated property and uppercase direction. Multiple sort params allowed to sort by multiple properties. Default to dateTimeOfDiscovery,DESC

get.summary: Return a list of adjudications for a given prisoner

parameters.name: offenceId
parameters.description: An offence id to allow optionally filtering by type of offence

parameters.name: prisonId
parameters.description: An agency id to allow optionally filtering by the prison in which the offence occurred

parameters.name: finding
parameters.description: Finding code to allow optionally filtering by type of finding

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Adjudications must have been reported on or after this date (in YYYY-MM-DD format).

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Adjudications must have been reported on or before this date (in YYYY-MM-DD format).

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

406.description: Not able to process the request because the header “Accept” does not match with any of the content types this endpoint can handle

parameters.name: awardCutoffDate
parameters.description: Only awards ending on or after this date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) will be considered.

parameters.name: adjudicationCutoffDate
parameters.description: Only proved adjudications ending on or after this date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) will be counted.

completed.description: Indicates when the statement is complete
